creditline: The James S. Bell Memorial Fund, by exchange
description: shell-shaped covered spice box; James I; oval body with flat back divided into two sections; ovolo mount, on four shell feet; hinged shell-shaped domed cover with matching mount; clasp and button at front
inscription:
-Mark

-On box below the hinge, are the pricked initials (rubbed) [?], [W], [E]- within pricked cartouche.
markings:

-Fully marked on underside of body and on interior of hinged cover.  Makers mark on base apparently double-struck, also inside cover flange near hinge.
title: Sugar box
